001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class, method, or constructor as implementing the
007 * <b>Static Factory</b> pattern.
008 * <p>
009 * The Static Factory pattern is an <i>object-graph</i> construction pattern
010 * that provides an alternative to direct use of the implementation constructor
011 * by exposing named factory methods/constructors. They are static and can be
012 * used from any context.
013 */
014@Documented
015@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.OBJECT_GRAPH)
016@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
017@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD, ElementType.CONSTRUCTOR})
018public @interface StaticFactory {
019}
